title: History: People (Usefulness 1)
description: Traveler usefulness 1/10 phrases for the People subcategory within History. Includes 4 card(s).

cards.english: The image of Prince Shotoku has been printed on seven different banknotes in total since 1930.
cards.romaji: Sh tokutaishi no sh z ga wa, sen ky.hyaku sanj. nen ik , nanakai mo osatsu ni insatsu saremashita.
cards.japanese: 聖徳太子の肖像画は、千九百三十年以降、七回もお札に印刷されました。

cards.english: In his childhood, Nobunaga Oda was called "the fool of the Owari region" because of his bizarre behaviour.
cards.romaji: Oda Nobunaga wa, kodomo no koro, kawatta k d no sei de "Owari no utsuke" to yobarete imashita.
cards.japanese: 織田信長は、子供の頃、変わった行動のせいで「尾張のうつけ」と呼ばれていました。

cards.english: Ryoma Sakamoto founded a private navy and trading company in Nagasaki.
cards.romaji: Sakamoto Ry ma wa, Nagasaki ni kaigun b eki gaisha o setsuritsu shimashita.
cards.japanese: 坂本龍馬は、長崎に海軍貿易会社を設立しました。

cards.english: Hirobumi Ito was chosen as Prime Minister four times.
cards.romaji: It Hirobumi wa, g kei yonkai s ridaijin ni erabaremashita.
cards.japanese: 伊藤博文は、合計四回総理大臣に選ばれました。
